content: this beautiful cowl makes a great gift and is a quick knit use up some stash yarns or buy a mini-skein bundle to mix and match sample cowl used 1 skein of woolstok worsted in midnight sea plus 2 mini-skeins each of 4 colors from the holiday frost mini skein bundle you could also do a 2-color cowl with 1 full skein of 2 contrasting colors of woolstok with the mini-skein bundle you would have enough for contrast colors on a second cowl as long as you re willing to mix up your colors you would need a second skein of your main color the possibilities are endless sample used 4 colors in the mini skeins and repeated the sequence 3 times the cowl can be made larger or smaller simply by altering the stitch count it needs to be a multiple of 4 stitches changing the stitch count will of course alter the quantity of yarn used
